headlines: You don’t wear it. You awaken it.
It’s not jewelry. It’s a reflection of you.
Not made to match. Made to reveal.
Born from silence. Made to speak.
You don’t own it. You embody it.
Crafted for the soul, not the showcase.
Hero.subhead: Your birth chart, shaped into light.

Statement.title: YOUR BIRTH CHART, SHAPED INTO LIGHT.
Statement.line1: Beyond trends and seasons, there is a map written only for you.
Statement.line2: Our intelligent atelier reads your astrological chart and translates it into a protective talisman – a piece of jewellery that carries your true essence, close to your skin.

banner_1.title:
Nothing less
than pure light.
banner_1.content: Every talisman begins with uncompromising materials. We work exclusively with VVS diamonds and precious metals refined to the highest standards, each stone hand-set to reveal its full clarity and fire. Because when a piece is meant to protect you, it deserves the finest light we can find.

banner_2.title:
From a star map to
 a stone you can touch.
banner_2.content: Your birth chart is translated by our AI into shapes, lines and colours – the secret architecture of your personal talisman. Rubies, garnets or rare red stones are then chosen to embody that energy, carved and set by our artisans. What starts as an invisible pattern in the sky becomes a jewel that lives on your skin.

banner_3.title:
Nothing less
than pure light.
banner_3.content: Every talisman begins with uncompromising materials. We work exclusively with VVS diamonds and precious metals refined to the highest standards, each stone hand-set to reveal its full clarity and fire. Because when a piece is meant to protect you, it deserves the finest light we can find.

Statement.title: A JEWELLERY HOUSE WRITTEN IN YOUR STARS.
Statement.line1: TALY was created for those who want more than something beautiful to wear.
Statement.line2: We use your astrological chart as our starting point, then let technology and craftsmanshipwork together to design a talisman only you could own. Every piece is a quiet alliance between your story, your sky and our atelier.

block1.title: WE BEGIN WITH YOUR SKY, NOT A SKETCH.
lines: You share your date, time and place of birth. Our intelligent system studies the map of your planets, aspects and elements, and translates them into lines, curves and symbolic motifs.
What would normally remain an unseen pattern becomes the blueprint of your future talisman.

block2.title: AND END WITH A PIECE THAT FEELS LIKE YOU.
lines: From that digital blueprint, our artisans choose metals, VVS diamonds and rare gemstones that resonate with your chart.
Each stone is set by hand, each proportion adjusted until the piece sits effortlessly on the body. The result is not a collection item, but a personal object you grow with over time.

StatementEnd.title: JEWELLERY THAT REMEMBERS WHO YOU ARE.
StatementEnd.line1: We do not design for everyone. We design for one person at a time.
StatementEnd.line2: Your talisman is meant to walk through years with you, to witness changes, to hold the intentions you set today. In a world of endless choice, TALY is our answer to a simple question: what if your most precious piece could only belong to you?

Contact.backgroundAlt: Taly contact background with reflected diamond
Contact.title: Contact Us

intro.line1: Have a question about your talisman, your birth chart design or your Taly Studio account?
intro.line2: Our team is here to help you continue your journey with ease.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can support you...

footer.note: A member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible, usually within 1–2 business days.

Pricing.backgroundAlt: Taly pricing background with starry sky
Pricing.title: Choose your path through the Taly universe.
Pricing.subtitle: Pick the plan that matches how often you want to create new talisman stories and visuals.

first.name: First Constellation
first.tagline: Your first steps into the Taly universe.

features.item2: Access to your personal Taly Studio dashboard
features.item3: Save and revisit your favourite designs

first.note: Perfect if you're just meeting Taly Studio and want to explore a few storylines and talisman visuals before going deeper.

celestial.name: Celestial Journey
celestial.tagline: Design, refine and rediscover your talisman story.
celestial.note: For those who want room to play: experiment with multiple birth-chart stories, visual directions and stone combinations until it feels exactly like you.

infinite.name: Infinite Sky

features.item1: Unlimited AI story & jewellery image generations
features.item2: Early access to new features and styles
features.item3: Ideal for power users, studios or collectors

infinite.note: For devoted creators and collectors. Generate new talisman stories and images as you wish, while refining and growing a living galaxy of designs around your birth chart.

footer.line1: All plans include access to Taly Studio, where you can save, revisit and refine every talisman you create.
footer.line2: You can upgrade, downgrade or cancel your plan at any time as your journey with Taly evolves.

Login.backgroundAlt: Taly Studio login background with diamonds
Login.title: Welcome back
Login.subtitle: To your constellation.
Login.intro: Sign in to continue your talisman journey and keep all your Taly creations in one safe place.
